name: Color spectrum (game jam demo)
description:
The world lost its colors, general panic! Only black and white remained. People live randomly in these colors, many have lost loved ones because cannot see them in a white space or black. Only the main character can return everything, with the help of his newfound ability - to switch between these two colors.

This game positions itself as a difficult platformer. In this, your enemy not only some kind of monster, but also YOU YOURSELF, or rather your reaction and accuracy. Although by the middle of the game this statement becomes literal.

Attetion! Along with the game, you need to download the second file, which is also located on the game page!

Game created by Spruce Wiz

music created by Soapy Lewis

"Full screen" in development...
